name: Skull Head World
description:
defend skullheadworld
shoot skulls at invading skulls
collect skulls to protect your skull
flush skulls to upgrade

part single-stick bullet-hell shooter, part top-down physics brawler.
super addictive arcade fun.
simple, responsive and accessible controls- just move your skull and it will take care of the rest.
no buttons, no combos.
fluid procedural animation and high-quality frame rate.
unlock and discover new characters and weapons!
compete on leaderboards across increasingly intense difficulties.
supports game controllers, keyboard or mouse. couch co-op too.
no advertisements or in-app purchases.
